		## United States in democratic, communist and fascist version; each version likes corresponding govt type
		#command = { trigger = { exists = USA government = { type = democratic country = USA } } type = trigger which = 8221002 }
		#command = { trigger = { exists = USA government = { type = communist country = USA } } type = trigger which = 8221003 }
		#command = { trigger = { exists = USA government = { type = fascist country = USA } } type = trigger which = 8221004 }
		#
		## United Kingdom in democratic, communist and fascist version; each version likes corresponding govt type
		#command = { trigger = { exists = ENG government = { type = democratic country = ENG } } type = trigger which = 8221005 }
		#command = { trigger = { exists = ENG government = { type = communist country = ENG } } type = trigger which = 8221006 }
		#command = { trigger = { exists = ENG government = { type = fascist country = ENG } } type = trigger which = 8221007 }
		#
		## France in democratic and fascist version; communist France behaves like democratic
		#command = { trigger = { exists = FRA NOT = { government = { type = fascist country = FRA } } } type = trigger which = 8221008 }
		#command = { trigger = { exists = FRA government = { type = fascist country = FRA } } type = trigger which = 8221010 }
		#
		## Communist France
		#command = { trigger = { exists = U11 } type = trigger which = 8221009 }
		#
		## Nationalist China in democratic and fascist version; communist China behaves like democratic
		#command = { trigger = { exists = CHI NOT = { flag = CHC_in_UNSC } NOT = { government = { type = fascist country = CHI } } } type = trigger which = 8221011 }
		#command = { trigger = { exists = CHI NOT = { flag = CHC_in_UNSC } government = { type = fascist country = CHI } } type = trigger which = 8221012 }
		#
		## Communist China
		#command = { trigger = { exists = CHC flag = CHC_in_UNSC government = { type = democratic country = USA } } type = trigger which = 82210013 }
		#
		## Soviet Union
		#command = { trigger = { exists = SOV NOT = { flag = un_soviet_boycott } government = { type = democratic country = USA } } type = trigger which = 8221014 }
		
		command = { type = money value = 10 }
	}
}

	# Support sanctions against non-our-alignment country
	action = {
		name = EVT_82210XX_B
		ai_chance = 80

		name = EVT_82210XX_C
		ai_chance = 80
		trigger = { 
			# Any of badboys is aligned to us
			OR = {
				AND = { flag = AFG_badboy government = { type = fascist country = AFG } }
				AND = { flag = ALB_badboy government = { type = fascist country = ALB } }
				AND = { flag = ALG_badboy government = { type = fascist country = ALG } }
				AND = { flag = ANG_badboy government = { type = fascist country = ANG } }

				AND = { flag = BUL_badboy government = { type = fascist country = BUL } }
				AND = { flag = BUR_badboy government = { type = fascist country = BUR } }

				AND = { flag = CAM_badboy government = { type = fascist country = CAM } }
				AND = { flag = CAN_badboy government = { type = fascist country = CAN } }
				AND = { flag = CGX_badboy government = { type = fascist country = CGX } }

	id = 8221008
	country = FRA

	# Veto sanctions against our-alignment country
	action = {
		name = EVT_82210XX_C
		ai_chance = 80
		trigger = {

### COMMUNIST FRANCE
event = {
	id = 8221009
	country = FRA
	
	name = EVT_82210XX_NAME
	desc = EVT_82210XX_DESC
	picture = "nwo\un_security_council"
	style = 1

	# Support sanctions against our-alignment country
	action = {
		name = EVT_82210XX_A
		ai_chance = 20
		trigger = { 
			# Any of badboys is aligned to us
			OR = {
				AND = { flag = AFG_badboy government = { type = communist country = AFG } }
				AND = { flag = ALB_badboy government = { type = communist country = ALB } }
				AND = { flag = ALG_badboy government = { type = communist country = ALG } }
				AND = { flag = ANG_badboy government = { type = communist country = ANG } }

### FASCIST FRANCE
event = {
	id = 8221010
	country = FRA
	
	name = EVT_82210XX_NAME
	desc = EVT_82210XX_DESC
	picture = "nwo\un_security_council"
	style = 1

	# Support sanctions against our-alignment country
	action = {
		name = EVT_82210XX_A
		ai_chance = 20
		trigger = { 
			# Any of badboys is aligned to us
			OR = {
				AND = { flag = AFG_badboy government = { type = fascist country = AFG } }
				AND = { flag = ALB_badboy government = { type = fascist country = ALB } }
				AND = { flag = ALG_badboy government = { type = fascist country = ALG } }
				AND = { flag = ANG_badboy government = { type = fascist country = ANG } }
				AND = { flag = ARA_badboy government = { type = fascist country = ARA } }
				AND = { flag = ARG_badboy government = { type = fascist country = ARG } }
				AND = { flag = ARM_badboy government = { type = fascist country = ARM } }
				AND = { flag = AST_badboy government = { type = fascist country = AST } }
				AND = { flag = AUS_badboy government = { type = fascist country = AUS } }
				AND = { flag = AZB_badboy government = { type = fascist country = AZB } }
				AND = { flag = BEL_badboy government = { type = fascist country = BEL } }
				AND = { flag = BEN_badboy government = { type = fascist country = BEN } }
				AND = { flag = BHU_badboy government = { type = fascist country = BHU } }
				AND = { flag = BLR_badboy government = { type = fascist country = BLR } }
				AND = { flag = BOL_badboy government = { type = fascist country = BOL } }
				AND = { flag = BOS_badboy government = { type = fascist country = BOS } }
				AND = { flag = BRA_badboy government = { type = fascist country = BRA } }
				AND = { flag = BRU_badboy government = { type = fascist country = BRU } }
				AND = { flag = BUL_badboy government = { type = fascist country = BUL } }
				AND = { flag = BUR_badboy government = { type = fascist country = BUR } }
				AND = { flag = CAL_badboy government = { type = fascist country = CAL } }
				AND = { flag = CAM_badboy government = { type = fascist country = CAM } }
				AND = { flag = CAN_badboy government = { type = fascist country = CAN } }
				AND = { flag = CGX_badboy government = { type = fascist country = CGX } }
				AND = { flag = CHC_badboy government = { type = fascist country = CHC } }
				AND = { flag = CHI_badboy government = { type = fascist country = CHI } }
				AND = { flag = CHL_badboy government = { type = fascist country = CHL } }
				AND = { flag = CMB_badboy government = { type = fascist country = CMB } }
				AND = { flag = COL_badboy government = { type = fascist country = COL } }
				AND = { flag = CON_badboy government = { type = fascist country = CON } }

		command = { trigger = { flag = U99_badboy } type = clrflag which = U99_sanctions }
	}
	
	# Veto sanctions against non-our-alignment country
	action = {
		name = EVT_82210XX_C
		ai_chance = 20
		trigger = { 
			# None of badboys is aligned to us
			NOT = {
				AND = { flag = AFG_badboy government = { type = fascist country = AFG } }
				AND = { flag = ALB_badboy government = { type = fascist country = ALB } }
				AND = { flag = ALG_badboy government = { type = fascist country = ALG } }
				AND = { flag = ANG_badboy government = { type = fascist country = ANG } }
				AND = { flag = ARA_badboy government = { type = fascist country = ARA } }
				AND = { flag = ARG_badboy government = { type = fascist country = ARG } }
				AND = { flag = ARM_badboy government = { type = fascist country = ARM } }
				AND = { flag = AST_badboy government = { type = fascist country = AST } }
				AND = { flag = AUS_badboy government = { type = fascist country = AUS } }
				AND = { flag = AZB_badboy government = { type = fascist country = AZB } }
				AND = { flag = BEL_badboy government = { type = fascist country = BEL } }
				AND = { flag = BEN_badboy government = { type = fascist country = BEN } }
				AND = { flag = BHU_badboy government = { type = fascist country = BHU } }

	id = 8221021
	persistent = yes
	
	name = EVT_8221021_NAME
	desc = EVT_8221021_DESC
	picture = "nwo\united_nations_intervention"
	style = 1

	trigger = {
		month = january
		NOT = { month = february }
		local_flag = un_embargo
	}

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1942 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		name = EVT_8221021_A #
		command = { type = industrial_modifier which = total value = 0.5 }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = un_embargo }
	}
}
